ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and by the reciters of the Reminder:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those who recite the Reminder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and those who recite the Exhortation;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and those who recite Our revelations,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by oath of the groups that read the Qur’an.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: By those who bring the Dhikr.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then those who recite, being mindful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the reciters of a Remembrance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And those who read (the Word) for a reminder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and by the reciters of the Reminder:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By the angels reciting the praise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by the ones who recite the reminder:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And thus proclaim the Message (of Allah)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: By those (angels) who bring the Book and the Quran from Allah to mankind [Tafsir Ibn Kathir].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and those who recite the Remembrance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the reciters of the Reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And those who recite the message,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:3] and those who recite, that is to say, the readers of the Qur’ān, they recite it, by way remembrance (dhikran is a verbal noun referring to [the action of] al-tāliyāt, ‘those who recite’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And those who read (the Word) for a reminder) He swore by the angels who recite the Qur'an; it is also said that He swore by the reciters of the Qur'an,
